meaning_str.bing:
n. 院子；场地；花园
v. 把(家畜)赶进栏里
网络. 码；庭院；车场

院子；庭院；码（长度单位）；帆桁；横杆；（铁路车站的）调车场；（牲畜的）围栏；作业场地；（尤指足球场的）码线
把…运至场内；把…堆积在院子里；把…驱入圈栏；使…进入畜栏

1.en: Send him into the Construction Yard to see all their units and see what the enemy sees.
1.cn: 派他到主基地可以看到敌人的所有单位和敌人所看到的。

2.en: "My mother had chickens in the yard when I was growing up, and I used to watch them mating, " I said.
2.cn: “我小时候妈妈在院子里养过小鸡，我曾看过他们交配”，他说。

3.en: When he had tied her up in the back-yard, the wretched father went and sat in the passage, with his knuckles to his eyes.
3.cn: 他把娜娜拴在后院里之后，这位倒霉的父亲就走到过道里，在那儿坐下，用双手掩住眼睛。

0.en: What backyard? Mouse lives in a yard in TV?
0.cn: 哪个后院？在电视里老鼠活在院子里吗？

1.en: It's just I put a lot of work into this yard.
1.cn: 只是这院子我也费了好多心。

2.en: Don't you love the huge yard? And the fireplace in the bedroom.
2.cn: 你喜欢那个大院子吗？还有睡房里的壁炉。

3.en: Then, one afternoon, I was coming into the front room to read when I heard a noise in the yard.
3.cn: 一天下午我到前厅看书，听见院子里有响声。

4.en: I could help you cross the street. No. I could help you cross your yard? No.
4.cn: 我可以牵着你过马路。不需要。我可以帮你穿过院子? 不用。

5.en: Now you just feel guilty because of the whole egg thing. Yeah, and I insulted her yard.
5.cn: 你是因为扔鸡蛋的事有负罪感。嗯，我还侮辱她的院子了。

6.en: A bird. Big eyes. Every night it sneaks into my yard and gobbles my poor azaleas.
6.cn: 一种长着大眼睛的鸟，每天晚上它都会偷偷钻进我的院子，吞掉我可怜的杜鹃花。

7.en: But there are systems in place here. You can't just keep him like a bunny you found in the yard. That's crazy.
7.cn: 但还有制度管着呢，你总不能把他当作一只院子里捡到的兔子留下吧，那也太扯了。

8.en: I guess the yard work was starting to get to him.
8.cn: 估计是修整院落让他过于劳累。

9.en: Standing here in the yard brings memories flooding back for me.
9.cn: 站在校园中，记忆仿佛泉涌。

10.en: And whenever she was in her yard, Grandpa was always there with her.
10.cn: 等她回到家里，外公又总是陪着她。

11.en: Well, Juli, I mean, look at your back yard. It's a complete mess. It's, like, covered in turds.
11.cn: 朱莉 你瞧瞧你家后院 乱得不像话，到处都是鸡粪。

12.en: All right, carb up, buddy. Tackle these pancakes like it's fourth and goal on the one-yard line.
12.cn: 好了，孩子，补充碳水化合物。干掉这些煎饼，如球赛到拼死一战的阶段一样。

13.en: My Asian granddaughter takes a hip-hop class? Why are we not talking about this in the front yard?
13.cn: 我的亚洲孙女在学黑人音乐嘻哈吗？我们为什么不去前院聊这件事呢？

14.en: We're all castoffs here. We've been dumped, donated, yard sales, second-handed and just plain thrown out.
14.cn: 我们都是弃儿，被抛弃，被捐赠... 宅前贱卖，二手交易 甚至赤裸裸地被丢弃

15.en: Best friends since childhood, Bucky Barnes and Steven Rogers were inseparable on both school yard and battlefield.
15.cn: 巴奇巴恩斯和史蒂夫罗杰斯从小就是好朋友，两人形影不离，无论是在校园里还是在战场上。

16.en: You're a chef who took 19 hours to make one loaf of bread. Stephen Hawking was more successful at the 100-yard dash.
16.cn: 你可是一个大厨，居然花了19小时做一个面包，史蒂芬霍金跑百米冲刺都比你行。

17.en: The work was slow, complicated, and cramped. This is how ships are built today, in hundreds of separate pieces, spread out across the yard.
17.cn: 整个工作缓慢而复杂，这是现在的方法船的几百个部件被分在不同的地方。

18.en: So these mountains of junk are actually raw materials. And they're so important that this scrap yard was built right here to feed that steel mill.
18.cn: 所以这些成山的废物，他们其实是原材料，它们真的很重要，这废料场建在这里把钢再碾磨。
